ygData.subject: Muddy Work
ygData.msgSnippet: Howdy all... I spent the Thanksgiving weeking throwing clay up in High Pass. Got my skill up to making at least pots, cookie molds and even Kiln firing is
ygData.messageBody:
Howdy all...

I spent the Thanksgiving weeking throwing clay up in High Pass.
Got my skill up to making at least pots, cookie molds and
even Kiln firing is trivial.

I am curious about Jars and Pickling (Baking).

I was able to fire a Medium size jar (4 pockets),
turned around and sold it to make room for another
clay run.

Now that I'm back in Freeport, I came across some
Gator Meat and have the recipe, but not the jar.
Meat+Vinegar+Sauces in Jar.

Question is, what size Jar?

I don't believe I can put my "Jar" into a "Spit"
since both count as containers. nFreeport isn't
a bad spot to fire off some jars and them have
them melt in the Oven, getting more gator meat
sounds like a trip to Oasis.

Does a LARGE JAR like a Mixing Bowl yield a COMBINE?

Thanks

Cleric Taven [Veeshan]
